subject: Invoice for Val's Lessons
body:
Hello Yuliya Kraftchick,

Here is the invoice for the work you have recieved.

Summary

Attached to this email should be 1 invoice for 1 job (Val's Lessons): for a total of $75.00.

Specific Note

Hello! Thanks a ton. This month was 25% off because I had to call out of week 2.

Details


Val's Lessons: 1 invoice totaling $75.00


Invoice #4 for $75.00


As of the time of this mailing, your current outstanding balance is: $0.00



Thank You,
Greg Goad Music Instruction

Do not reply to this email.

Replies to this email are not checked.

Contact Information
